name: wishful
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
imagining or discussing what you wish or hope for, especially when this is very unlikely to happen : It would be great if we could get the entire class back together for a reunion, but that might be a wishful thought. He claimed that he could catch 12 fish in an hour, but that may have been a wishful exaggeration.
More examplesFewer examplesThe show presents a wishful vision of the world as one big happy family. This claim is just wishful fantasy on their part.
